oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Thomas R. Jones, Sr. correspondence with Mary Mildred Jones, 1944 August 20
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jones, Thomas R., Sr.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from Tommy Jones to his wife, Mary Mildred, in which he discusses not being able to write whilst much overseas. He discusses his experience, and how it all feels like a dream. He discusses their son, T. Roy, and encourages her to help him with his school work.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Soldiers -- United States -- 20th century -- History; World War, 1939-1945
Jones, Mary Mildred; Jones, Thomas R., Sr.
United States. Army. Infantry Division, 65th
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Thomas R. Jones, Sr. World War II correspondence
